summary: It is just a small story inspired by what I experienced, witnessed, learned, and, hope.
descriptionHtml:
"They hunted them into extinction, until the last Beast
Escaping deep into the forest, yet the hunters pursuited relentlessly
It was frightened, the Beast was calling out for its lost kinsmen
The hunters followed

The Beast's heart beated faster, it was bleeding
Its blood touched the ground, withered flowers bloomed
And the dying beetles flapped its wings again
The hunters followed the trail of blood

There, under the great blue moss tree, the Beast rested
The hunters were getting closer
And the tree wrapped the Beast in its roots
So the hunters burned the tree

With its last strength, the Beast pulled out its heart
The fire died down, the tree was young again
And the hunters left
The silent white eagle came

With its gentle touch, the bird lifted the body of the Beast
It flew over the hunter's village, and the headman was weeping
Weeping over his dying daughter, for he sold the last slice of the hearts, in his greed
The eagle flew on

The white mountain greeted them, under the rising dawn
And the eagle settled the Beast down, with that gaping hole in its chest
Those familiar shadows gathered silently around its body, they chanted

The Beast lifted its head, and smiled"

I know it seems to have some religious theme, or some elements similar to "Princess Mononoke".

Myself is of mixed races, and I have my own believe. Even without knowledge of what stated abover, it would still have the same themes and ending.
All cultures share many similar tales, wisdoms, its own version of Romeo and Juliet.

I downloaded GBs of files, over 1000 mods, 99.9% are of Skyrim. I have inspired by so many great people, like our Good brother "Gopher", and Irresistible "Vilja", so many brothers and sisters.

This is my Nexus.


Sorry if I sound a little sentimental, because I am.
author: austiger
